paragraphs.text:
val keySpace ="cloudcomputing"
val table="seasonal"

val df = 
sqlContext.read.format("org.apache.spark.sql.cassandra").options(Map("keyspace" 
-> keySpace, "table" -> table)).load()
df.createOrReplaceTempView(table)

table: String = seasonal
